S06n572:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-sarvadharmānupalambho batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate |
S06n572:3: apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ |
S06n572:9: atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ |
S06n572:11: tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06n572:13: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ tāṃśca kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayate sma-yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha-anujāto'yaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasyeti |
S06n572:39: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro'vikalpo nirvikalpastathāgatasyānujātaḥ |
S06n572:40: yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06n572:42: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06n572:61: evameva ca tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ |
S06n572:71: yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06n572:72: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā |
S06n572:73: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate |
S06n572:82: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram |
S06n572:83: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram |
S06n572:87: yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate |
S06n572:88: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat,
S06n572:96: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ ||
S06n572:97: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ |
S06n572:99: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta,
S06n572:102: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīracaryeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta tathatā |
S06n572:105: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
S06n572:106: pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
S06n572:107: pañcabhiśca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06n572:109: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni?
S06n572:111: sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ dhyānānyutpāditāni |
S06n572:112: te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan |
S06n572:113: kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā,
S06n572:117: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet |
S06n572:118: sa trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta |
S06n572:119: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet,
S06n572:122: sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet-iha jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta |
S06n572:123: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet-aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti |
S06n572:124: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭhātum?
S06n572:127: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet?
S06n572:129: kṛtaśca sa bhagavan upahataśca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham |
S06n572:135: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n572:143: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet,
S06n572:144: evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati ||
S06n572:145: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati,
S06n572:147: na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na jānāti na paśyati |
S06n572:148: na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti, na paśyati |
S06n572:151: taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumicchati |
S06n572:152: tato veditavyametat-sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti |
S06n572:154: evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati-yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati ||
S06n572:155: śāriputra āha-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi-yo bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
S06n572:156: kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaśca bhavati,
S06n572:158: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06n572:163: kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaśca bhavati,
S06n572:165: tasmāttarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06n572:167: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S06n572:168: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06n572:171: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayate sma-evametaddevaputrāḥ, evametat |
S06n572:182: na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ śakyo'bhisaṃboddhum |
S06n572:184: yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate,
S06n572:191: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mamaivaṃ bhavati-svabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ na durabhisaṃbhaveti |
S06n572:192: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ |
S06n572:197: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ |
S06n572:200: na hyāyuṣman subhūte ākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati-ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti |
S06n572:201: evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ |
S06n572:204: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06n572:205: na tvevaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n572:206: yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06n572:207: tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate-durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ |
S06n572:209: evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
S06n572:211: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:214: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
S06n572:216: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:222: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā,
S06n572:226: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:229: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06n572:233: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
S06n572:235: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
S06n572:237: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:240: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06n572:244: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n572:246: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n572:248: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:251: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06n572:255: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n572:257: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n572:259: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:262: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06n572:263: anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ?
S06n572:265: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n572:267: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n572:269: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:272: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06n572:276: subhūtirāha-takiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
S06n572:278: subhūtirāha-tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:281: subhūtirāha-tatkatamaḥ punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
S06n572:283: katamo vā punaḥ sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā?
S06n572:286: subhūtirāha-evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06n572:288: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yayā dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati,
S06n572:289: tayā na sa kaściddharmo yo vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n572:290: ye ca khalu punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
S06n572:292: ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ ||
S06n572:293: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekamapi bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā |
S06n572:295: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punastvamāyuṣman subhūte ekamapi bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
S06n572:297: tatra tathatāyāmekamapi bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
S06n572:305: subhūtirāha- evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthititastasya bodhisattvadharmasyānupalabhyamānasya kutastavaivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ,
S06n572:308: evameteṣāmāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
S06n572:310: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu subhūte |
S06n572:312: pratibhāti te subhūte yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānenedaṃ vadasi |
S06n572:313: evameteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
S06n572:315: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S06n572:316: bhagavānāha-anuttarayā śāriputra samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ||
S06n572:317: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-anuttarāyāṃ bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06n572:318: bhagavānāha-anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam |
S06n572:328: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ |
S06n572:329: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06n572:332: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryamārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ prajñāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaṃ,
S06n572:334: anyeṣāmapi tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam |
S06n572:335: evaṃ satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau sattvaparipācane ca sthitvā anyeṣāmapi tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam |
S06n572:336: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti ||
